name: Go K8s Dev
postCreateCommand: .devcontainer/install-kind.sh && .devcontainer/checkout-repos.sh && .devcontainer/recreate-existing-worktrees.sh && source /usr/local/share/nvm/nvm.sh && nvm install --lts && nvm use --lts && nvm alias default lts/* && npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code && echo 'Devcontainer setup complete - Node.js/npm/claude installed'
